pages.text: This block is the heart of the Rain Collector multiblock structure. $(br)Place down the controller. On its cardinal point faces you can place down $(l:rain_collector)Rain Collectors$(/l).$(br)Use the $(l:pipe_wrench)Pipe Wrench$(/l) with a right click on the Controller to let it search for connected collectors.$(br)Alternativly you can search for blocks using the button the in the GUI.

pages.title: R. Collector Controller
pages.text: On its own it acts quite similar to the $(l:rain_tank_wood)Wooden Rain Tank$(/l) but collects more water.$(br)The block is fully automatable.$(br)A comparator can be used to read the water level of the tank.
